Class Orbiting

java.lang.Object
Orbiting
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Orbiting
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Author:
Olivia this class uses multithreading to allow a user to watch a planet orbit a star multiple planets may be added (up to 8 per star) and 8 moon can orbit a planet which is orbiting a star
